thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 05 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Chicago Stock Exchange To Be Acquired By Intercontinental Exchange

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chicago Stock Exchange To Be Acquired By Intercontinental Exchange
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Chicago Stock Exchange:
* CHICAGO STOCK EXCHANGE TO BE ACQUIRED BY INTERCONTINENTAL EXCHANGE, INC.
* CHICAGO STOCK EXCHANGE SAYS TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED
* CHICAGO STOCK EXCHANGE SAYS DEAL HAS BEEN UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED BY CHX HOLDINGS BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE IN 2018
* CHICAGO STOCK EXCHANGE SAYS CHX WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE AS A REGISTERED NATIONAL SECURITIES EXCHANGE BASED IN CHICAGO
* CHICAGO STOCK EXCHANGE TO BE ACQUIRED BY INTERCONTINENTAL EXCHANGE, INC. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
